name: It's all in your mind
description:
Description:

This game/experience was made in 48 hours for the AngrySmile's Discord Jam. The jam's theme is 'Psychedelic'.

Every playthrough will be unique due to randomness. This game has no plot. But your mind could make one.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WARNING:

A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights (which this game might include). Exposure to certain patterns or backgrounds on a television screen or when playing video games may trigger epileptic seizures or blackouts in these individuals.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play:

Press W/S or Up/Down key to move.

Use headphones for a better experience.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Programmer: Tottori
